articles.author: Utathya Nag
articles.title: Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024: India women win title - Olympics
articles.description: The Indian women’s team beat Thailand 3-2 in the final to win their maiden Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024 gold medal on Sunday. Anmol Kharb won the decider.
articles.content:
The Indian womens team won a historic gold medal at the Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024 after beating Thailand 3-2 in the final in Shah Alam, Malaysia on Sunday.
